column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Regarding some of your points
column2: I would like to apologize that our menu does not list "half-seasoned egg" as it should. We are hoping to remedy this for future printings of our menu. To that end
column3: some of our bowls do contain half an egg because our corporate JINYA headquarters long ago devised the recipes based not only on flavor
column4: but also the particular costs of ingredients and the price points they were targeting for each bowl of ramen. Keep in mind
column5: as one of many franchises around the country
column6: we are serving thousands of bowls of ramen each day
column7: and a full egg versus half egg must be measured in these terms.
